title: Sketchbook Folio, "A Painted Wall Decoration", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash on white wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left corner: 44; at center right: Anibale Caracci Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Part of painted frieze with part of enframed landscape at left, and panel with three putti, swag, and part of enframed circular figurative paintings. Moldings above and dentils above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "A Painted Wall Decoration", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash on white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3513.
